definitions: the arrangement or classification of something into different groups

examples.text: wealth is the main symbol of social stratification
stratification of patients into low-, moderate-, and high-risk groups
a metropolis with a multiplicity of ethnic, social, and age stratifications

shortDefinitions: arrangement or classification of different groups

definitions: the formation of strata in rock

examples.text: rock seams without any distinct stratification

definitions: the placing of seeds close together in layers in moist sand or peat to preserve them or to help them germinate

examples.text: following cold stratification, seeds were germinated in greenhouses

shortDefinitions: placing of seeds close together in layers
